I am in process of tearing down my engine and refreshing. Piston and cylinder within nominal specs so will add new rings and replace my repaired shifter shaft. Clean up and re seal. With the clean up I would like to address the cover paint/ Coating. It looks like a paint or a satin clear coat. Any tips on restoring the factory finish look?
